short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Required to utilize the IT service features on your desktop computer with the applications USU Smart Alert and USU Knowledge Center

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your IT service desk is the central point of contact for users with technical problems and IT-related questions. Users want a convenient way to solve their IT inquiries. Whether a help request is made via a ticket, email, or through self-service, your IT services should deliver a top quality service experience designed to improve cost efficiencies.

Proactive alerts help you to send IT information to all affected users in a pop-up and significantly reduce IT service requests during incidents.
